languages.text: {n}Ваших познаний о природе {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} достаточно, чтобы обмануть систему и подчинить ее функции своей воле. Ложный запрос, хитрая манипуляция управления — и вы добиваетесь своего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваших познаний в природе машинных духов достаточно, чтобы обмануть систему и подчинить ее функции своей воле. Ложный запрос, хитрая манипуляция управления — и вы добиваетесь своего.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваших познаний о природе {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} достаточно, чтобы обмануть систему и подчинить ее функции своей воле. Ложный запрос, хитрая манипуляция управления — и вы добиваетесь своего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your knowledge is sufficient to trick the machine spirit and bend the cogitator's systems to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of control — and you get what you want.{/n}
{n}Your knowledge is sufficient to trick the machine spirit and bend the cogitator's systems to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of control — and you get what you want.{/n}

{n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of control — and you finally get what you want.{/n}

{n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of control — and you finally get what you want.{/n}

{n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

{n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你对{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}有着充分了解，足以欺骗这个系统，让它为你的意志服务。只需一次错误的询问，一个狡猾的操作，你就得到了你想得到的东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你对{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}有着充分了解，足以欺骗这个系统，让它为你的意志服务。只需一次错误的询问，一个狡猾的操作，你就得到了你想得到的东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu conocimiento de los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} es suficiente para engañar al sistema y subyugarlo a tu voluntad. Una falsa consulta, una hábil manipulación de los controles, y consigues lo que buscabas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu conocimiento de los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} es suficiente para engañar al sistema y subyugarlo a tu voluntad. Una falsa consulta, una hábil manipulación de los controles, y consigues lo que buscabas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}今ある{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}の知識でも、システムを騙してこちらの意のままにするには十分だ。偽のクエリに巧妙なコントロール操作…それで望みのものを手に入れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}今ある{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}の知識でも、システムを騙してこちらの意のままにするには十分だ。偽のクエリに巧妙なコントロール操作…それで望みのものを手に入れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Kenntnisse über {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} reichen aus, um das System zu überlisten und ihm deinen Willen aufzuzwingen. Eine falsche Anfrage, eine geschickte Manipulation der Steuerung – und du erhältst, was du willst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Kenntnisse über {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} reichen aus, um das System zu überlisten und ihm deinen Willen aufzuzwingen. Eine falsche Anfrage, eine geschickte Manipulation der Steuerung – und du erhältst, was du willst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre connaissance des {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} vous permet de duper le système et de le soumettre à votre volonté. Il aura suffi d'une requête trompeuse et d'une astucieuse manipulation de ses commandes pour arriver à vos fins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre connaissance des {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} vous permet de duper le système et de le soumettre à votre volonté. Il aura suffi d'une requête trompeuse et d'une astucieuse manipulation de ses commandes pour arriver à vos fins.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Makine ruhları{/g} ile ilgili bilgi birikimin, sistemi kandırıp boyun eğdirmeni sağlıyor. Sahte bir sorgu girip kontrollerle kurnazca oynayarak istediğini elde ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your knowledge of {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} is sufficient to trick the system and subdue it to your will. A false query, a crafty manipulation of the controls — and you get what you want.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Makine ruhları{/g} ile ilgili bilgi birikimin, sistemi kandırıp boyun eğdirmeni sağlıyor. Sahte bir sorgu girip kontrollerle kurnazca oynayarak istediğini elde ediyorsun.{/n}
